COMMENT_TX: Angels pitcher Garrett Richards left the game due to an injured arm
replay,6,simma001,ANA,barrt901,OAK01,,N,M,ANA,C $when Ben Revere was called out at 2B, Angels manager Mike Scioscia challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay

ej,banij001,M,welkb901,Fair/foul call $Khris Davis hit a grounder over 3B that was ruled fair by 3B Umpire Mike Everett; however it was not his call to make and HP Umpire Bill Welke ruled the ball foul; the Rangers thought they had put out Davis on the play; Rangers Manager Jeff Banister ejected by Welke
$Mitch Haniger's throw struck the 2B bag and caromed away, allowing another run to score
replay,5,alony001,OAK,hallt901,OAK01,,N,M,OAK,A $when Jaff Decker was called out at 1B, Athletics manager Bob Melvin challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay

$originally not a sacrifice which was added on 04-28-2017

ej,melvb001,M,wintm901,Dead ball call Athletics Manager Bob Melvin ejected by 3B umpire Mike Winters; two runs had scored on the play but the ball was under a chair in the RF bullpen and it was declared a dead ball; Chad Pinder was sent back to 3B and Josh Phegley, who had reached 3B, was sent to 2B
